quotes.quote: I am not an adventurer by choice but by fate.
Adventure is worthwhile in itself.
It is only in adventure that some people succeed in knowing themselves â€” in finding themselves.
There is more security in the adventurous and exciting, for in movement there is life, and in change there is power.
The biggest adventure you can ever take is to live the life of your dreams.
Fill your life with tiny and large adventurous moments.
Always remember, it's simply not an adventure worth telling if there aren't any dragons.
A large volume of adventures may be grasped within this little span of life, by him who interests his heart in everything.
Without adventure civilization is in full decay.
Life is either a great adventure or nothing.
Blessed are the curious, for they shall have adventures.
A man practices the art of adventure when he heroically faces up to life. When he has the daring to open doors to new experiences.
There are some of us who are just born with a more adventurous spirit than others.
Fill your life with adventure, not things. Have stories to tell, not stuff to show.
Adventure is not outside man; it is within.
Nothing adventured, nothing attained.
Adventure: the pursuit of life.
Adventure is worthwhile.
Believe me! The secret of reaping the greatest fruitfulness and the greatest enjoyment from life is to live dangerously!
Nothing makes a man so adventurous as an empty pocket.
Say yes to adventures.
To the sober person adventurous conduct often seems insanity.
Adventures are to the adventurous.
There is no end to the adventures that we can have if only we seek them with our eyes open.
Let your walks now be a little more adventurous.
Plunge boldly into the thick of life, and seize it where you will, it is always interesting.
Only those who risk going too far can possibly find out how far they can go.
Adventure, without it, why live?
It is always the adventurers who do great things, not the sovereigns of great empires.
It is always the adventurous who accomplish great things.
One way to get the most out of life is to look upon it as an adventure.
Let us step into the night and pursue that flighty temptress, adventure.
Man cannot discover new oceans unless he has the courage to lose sight of the shore.
